meanings.definition: The state or condition of being a bachelor.
meanings.sent1: In bachelordom, he enjoyed his independence and freedom.
meanings.sent2: After years of bachelordom, he finally decided to settle down and get married.
meanings.sent3: The bachelordom of the group made them the life of the party.
meanings.sent4: His bachelordom was a shield against the pressures of commitment.
meanings.sent5: The bachelordom lifestyle was all he had ever known.

meanings.sent1: The bachelordom gathered for their weekly poker night.
meanings.sent2: The bachelordom shared a house and split the rent equally.
meanings.sent3: The bachelordom always had each other's backs in times of need.
meanings.sent4: The bachelordom was a brotherhood bound by their single status.
meanings.sent5: The bachelordom was a close-knit group of friends who enjoyed each other's company.
